uhh_lt.newsleak.preprocessing

Class NewsleakPreprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uhh_lt.newsleak.preprocessing.NewsleakPreprocessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InformationExtraction2Postgres, Postgres2ElasticsearchIndexer

    public abstract class NewsleakPreprocessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to provide common functionality for each newsleak data reader (e.g. processing the preprocessing configuration file, initialization of the postgres database connection, and the metadata UIMA resource initialization).

      • getElasticsearchResourceDescription

        protected org.apache.uima.resource.ExternalResourceDescription getElasticsearchResourceDescription(java.lang.String createNewIndex)
        Gets the elasticsearch resource description.
        Parameters:
        createNewIndex - Should be "true" or "false". If "true", the index will be newly created (a pre-existing index with the same name will be overwritten)
        Returns:
        the metadata resource description
